content:
Congratulations on being a part of your cousin's special day! It's great that it's got you thinking about your own wedding plans.

An outdoor ceremony at the Grand Hyatt in downtown LA sounds stunning! I'm sure it was a beautiful backdrop for your cousin's wedding. What specifically about the decorations stood out to you? Was there something in particular that you loved or didn't love about the decor?

Are you considering a similar outdoor ceremony or a different type of venue for your own wedding? Knowing your vision and preferences will help me provide more tailored advice on wedding decorations.

Also, have you and your partner discussed any specific themes, colors, or styles for your wedding? Sharing your ideas will give me a better understanding of what you're looking for.
